column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Michael George Tolkien]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Publication:''' The letter was originally published as [[letter 266]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''.<ref>{{L|266}}
column2: p. 352</ref> [[Wayne G. Hammond|Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull|Scull]] published a description of other parts of the letter in their [[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology'']] (p. 627). A few additional words from the letter have appeared in Michael Tolkien's transcript of his lecture delivered at the [[Wikipedia:University of St Andrews|University of St Andrews]] (section 14).<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Michael Tolkien (b. 1943)|Michael George Tolkien]]|articleurl=http://www.michaeltolkien.com/page74.html|articlename=Lecture on J.R.R.
